overview: When Fiona Reid, a brilliant female law student, signs up for Professor Frank Sloan's criminology class, she quickly realizes she has signed on for more than she bargained for. Within days of Fiona joining the class, a series of sickeningly violent, random killings rise up striking fear in the hearts of the local college town student body. With a surprise ending no one will see coming, the twists never seem to stop in this shocking dark thriller.
title: Murder 101
